Method.Doc: Gets a list of allocations that meet the given criteria.

Param.name: text
Param.doc: Allocation's id or role's id, name or code

XSelect.XField: a.*, IF(a.id_person = 0, '-', a.id_person) AS "id_person", IF(a.id_person = 0, '-', p.display_name) AS "person_display_name", IF(a.id_person_group = 0, '-', a.id_person_group) AS "id_person_group", r.code

XFrom.XTable: fw_allocation a INNER JOIN fw_role r ON (r.id = a.id_role) LEFT OUTER JOIN fw_person p ON (p.id = a.id_person) LEFT OUTER JOIN fw_person_group pg ON (pg.id = a.id_person_group)

XWhere.XCondition: AND ( a.id LIKE '{param->text}' OR r.id LIKE '{param->text}' OR r.code LIKE '{param->text}' OR r.name LIKE '{param->text}' )

XOrderBy.XOrder: p.display_name ASC, pg.name ASC, r.code ASC
